review:
Dr Rohith sir was really amazing.I was very impressed by your treatment and over all experience at partha dental clinic. My 20 year old son met with the accident and searching so much for good doc online , this whn I saw Dr ROHITH RAJASHEKHAR   who sits at dasarahalli branch.  When we met  I m so scared for my child. Doctor calmed me and made me understand the treatment modality and did multiple treatments like rct crowns extraction. Now my son could smile well bcz of Dr Rohith sir.. thank you ton sir for your kind and overwhelming response.  üôè  
Now I  refer everyone who is in need of to kindly go to sir . I have super confidence that you would get disappointed.

I got severe pain in my teeth , checked reviews about Dr Rohith rajashekhar @partha dental clinic located at dasarahalli. 
I went to clinic wer Dr Rohith rajashekhar  met me n explained about various treatment very well, gave his good time.   I got my dental treatment without any pain . I was very happy about the over all experience. It is guniene about the review. I always  happy about the overall experience at Dr Rohith dental clinic. I recommend everyone for getting their treatment done from Dr Rohith sir.
I give five star to my Dr Rohith rajashekhar.
